creator: adrian@ephox.com
text:
The nightly builds have been failing due to a few incompatible changes in CVS HEAD of HttpClient.  
Since I'm not on the slide mailing list (I'm a HttpClient committer), I thought I'd open this bug so I 
can provide a patch to fix things and get any comments etc from you slide folks.

It is worth noting that the incompatible changes are only on the HEAD branch and not the 2.0 
branch which is very close to being released now, so if you're heading towards a release soonish 
then you probably want to stick with HttpClient 2.0 and ignore the Gump build failures.  
Otherwise, the patch I'll attach soonish should fix things up again.

creator: adrian@ephox.com
text:
Hmm, I now recall the thousands of dependencies I need to track down for Slide.  Any work on this 
will have to wait until tomorrow when I have time to work through Slide's build process.  It would 
be good to hear the thoughts of the Slide folks as to whether or not you want to keep in sync with 
HttpClient CVS HEAD or just with the 2.0 release.

creator: mvdb@apache.org
text: Not an issue anymore I guess :)
